name: Robotherapy
storyline: You're a robot therapist in a dystopian robot society that killed all humans, but is still not happy. Talk to your robot patients, make dialogue choices, meet damaged robots and learn about robot nature. If killing all humans doesn't bring happiness, then what does?
summary: An emotional dark comedy about robots doing therapy. In Robotherapy, you're a robot therapist in a dystopian society that killed all the humans, but is still not happy. Treat patients, meet weird robots and enter their minds. If killing all humans doesn't bring happiness, then what does?

videos.name: Trailer
